Welcome to MathSoc!

We are the 103rd Session of the Dublin University Mathematical Society!

Some of our Events

  • Weekly problem sessions
  • Guest lectures
  • Donut Reception
  • Junior Cert Speed Run
  • Integral Bee

Socials

Follow us on Instagram for regular updates and riveting mathsoc content!

Also come and relax, read, discuss problems, or solve puzzles anytime at the MathSoc room. You can find us at Room 20 in the Hamilton building.
